AMO-Tools-Suite  v.0.3.3
Set of tools for calculating energy efficiency in industrial equipment
README.md
1 AMO Tools Suite
2 ---------------
3 
4 AMO Tools Suite is a cross-platform collection of calculations and tools to support industrial equipment modeling.
5 See our hosted documentation for the latest release at [ornl-amo.github.io](https://ornl-amo.github.io/)
6 
7 ### Dependencies
8 #### C++
9 - make
10 - CMake (cmake-curses to use the ccmake gui)
11 - GCC 4.8.5 or later
12 - Doxygen (only for building documentation)
13 
14 #### Node
15 - Node [https://nodejs.org/en/](https://nodejs.org/en/) v8 or v9
16 - gyp: follow instructions for the OS at [https://github.com/nodejs/node-gyp](node-gyp)
17  - it also installs the correct python version
18 
19 ### Building
20 - Edit the CMakeCache and enable desired build options via the ccmake tool: `ccmake .` and `make` to build
21 - If ccmake isn't available, use `cmake -D BUILD_TESTING:BOOL=ON -D BUILD_PACKAGE:BOOL=OFF --config Debug ./` and `cmake --build .` where config can be `Release`, `Debug`, `MinSizeRel` or `RelWithDebInfo`
22 - To build node modules: `npm install` or if already installed, `node-gyp rebuild` to rebuild the modules
23 
24 ### Unit Tests
25 - To run the javascript tests for the node addons: `npm run test`
26 - To build C++ unit tests directly, ensure the `BUILD_TESTING` flag is set then: `cmake --build . --target amo_tools_suite_tests`
27 - On MacOS or Linux, the test executable can be found under the `bin` directory. On Windows, the executable can be found under either the `Debug` or `Release` directories, depending on CMake configuration
28 
29 ### Packaging
30 - Enable the `BUILD_PACKAGE` flag in the CMakeCache, then `cmake ./` then `make package`
31 - Or use this directly for Windows: `cmake -D BUILD_TESTING:BOOL=OFF ./` and `cmake --build . --config Release --target PACKAGE`
32 - To make package on Linux or Mac, run `ccmake.` and set BUILD_TESTING OFF, BUILD_PACKAGE ON, then configure and generate. Then `make package`.
33 
34 ### Documentation
35 - To generate documentation: `doxygen Doxyfile.in`
Generated by   1.8.13
